ProjectTitle: Molecular and physiological analysis of discolorations in witloof chicory
InitialFeedbackHistory: 05/04/2023 [REDACTED] you don't mention factors restricting sharing, consider using a data repository to preserve your data and to make it available for reuse, for example RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or a disciplinary repository, these also often have guidelines on metadata standards, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing, you can also find a lot of information in the elixir RDMkit: https://rdmkit.elixir-europe.org/plant_sciences
label: good with suggestions
